page_content:
Our success as a global biopharmaceutical 
company is predicated on our ability to ask the right questions and to energetically seek answers. How can a new medicine be best designed?  How can patient outcomes be improved?  How can we structure our company to best  serve patients, employees and communities?  Our culture of inquiry and collaborative problem-solving strengthens our business and underpins how we approach corporate responsibility.  We are dedicated to continuous improvement in both our solutions for patients and our performance as a responsible corporate citizen.
RICHARD F. POPS
Chief Executive Officer“
”
